info.name: TetrisApi
info.description: Documentation for the API of a mobile game based on Tetris

request.description: Fetch the current user to get basic information about it

This route is for configuration and development only

It have to be limited so every player can't access it

response.name: success - max score
success

item.name: user

request.description: Get every game of the player
Get the progress of the player in every achievement

response.name: success
response.body:

request.description: Get the profil with some stats of the player

item.description: This section is to manage player informations

request.description:
Get the leaderboard of every player based on the best score thay made

The default value for period is 'all-time'

The default value for limit is '10'

response.name: success - weekly
success - daily
success - all time

request.description:
Get the leaderboard of every player based on the total score thay made

The default value for period is 'all-time'

The default value for limit is '10'

response.name: success - weekly
success - daily
success all time
